microprocessor.name: SRC-TCP [Interface] Passenger Lighting v1.3
microprocessor.description: Connects to passenger module. Controls lights in passenger cars

node.label: RGB Lights
node.description: Ouputs RGB values to RGB lights

node.label: UI
node.description: Connects to Instruments or Display Controller

object.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} col={a=0.5,b=0.5,c=0.5} --rgb
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press=gB(1) night=gB(3) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
if onPress(6,24,19,9) then on = not on end if onPress(6,36,19,9) then mode = false end if onPress(6,48,19,9) then mode = true end
o=math.max(d.w/2-14,29) tA=onTouch(o,24,7,33) tB=onTouch(o+11,24,7,33) tC=onTouch(o+22,24,7,33) u = tA or tB or tC
if u then slide=mode and rgb2hsv(unpack(col)) or col end if tA then slide.a=(56-t.y)/32 end if tB then slide.b=(56-t.y)/32 end if tC then slide.c=(56-t.y)/32 end if u then col=mode and hsv2rgb(unpack(slide)) or slide end
sN(1,on and col.a or 0) sN(2,on and col.b or 0) sN(3,on and col.c or 0)
pre=gB(1) end
function setC2(v) setC({v.a*100,v.b*100,v.c*100}) end
function dGHSV(x,y,l,c1,c2) dA,dB,dC = (c2.a-c1.a)/(l-1),(c2.b-c1.b)/(l-1),(c2.c-c1.c)/(l-1) for i=0,l-1,1 do setC2(hsv2rgb(unpack(c1))) c1.a=c1.a+dA c1.b=c1.b+dB c1.c=c1.c+dC dRF(x+i,y,1,1) end end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() w=s.getWidth() h=s.getHeight() setC(theme.bg2) s.drawClear()
setC(theme.acc) dL(6,24,6,33) if on then dRF(6,24,19,9) setC(theme.bg2) else setC(theme.fg) end dT(9,26,on and "on" or "off")
setC(theme.fg) dL(6,36,6,45) if not mode then dRF(6,36,19,9) setC(theme.bg2) end dT(9,38,"rgb")
setC(theme.fg) dL(6,48,6,57) if mode then dRF(6,48,19,9) setC(theme.bg2) end dT(9,50,"hsv")
o=math.max(w/2-14,29) setC(theme.bg) dRF(o,24,7,33) dRF(o+11,24,7,33) dRF(o+22,24,7,33)
pos=mode and rgb2hsv(unpack(col)) or col a=math.floor(pos.a*33+0.5) b=math.floor(pos.b*33+0.5) c=math.floor(pos.c*33+0.5)
setC(theme.fg) dRF(o,57-a,7,a) dRF(o+11,57-b,7,b) dRF(o+22,57-c,7,c)
setC2(col) dRF(o,17,29,3)
if mode then dGHSV(o,22,7,{a=0,b=1,c=1},{a=1,b=1,c=1}) dGHSV(o+11,22,7,{a=pos.a,b=0,c=1},{a=pos.a,b=1,c=1}) dGHSV(o+22,22,7,{a=0,b=0,c=0},{a=0,b=0,c=1}) else setC({100,0,0}) dL(o,22,o+7,22) setC({0,100,0}) dL(o+11,22,o+18,22) setC({0,0,100}) dL(o+22,22,o+29,22) end
end
function clamp(v,x,y) return math.min(math.max(v,x),y) end function unpack(x) return x.a,x.b,x.c end function rgb2hsv(a,b,c)local d,e=math.max(a,b,c),math.min(a,b,c)local f,g,h;h=d;local i=d-e;if d==0 then g=0 else g=i/d end;if d==e then f=0 else if d==a then f=(b-c)/i;if b<c then f=f+6 end elseif d==b then f=(c-a)/i+2 elseif d==c then f=(a-b)/i+4 end;f=f/6 end;return{a=f,b=g,c=h}end;function hsv2rgb(f,g,h)local a,b,c;local j=math.floor(f*6)local k=f*6-j;local l=h*(1-g)local m=h*(1-k*g)local n=h*(1-(1-k)*g)j=j%6;if j==0 then a,b,c=h,n,l elseif j==1 then a,b,c=m,h,l elseif j==2 then a,b,c=l,h,n elseif j==3 then a,b,c=l,m,h elseif j==4 then a,b,c=n,l,h elseif j==5 then a,b,c=h,l,m end;return{a=a,b=b,c=c}end

c0.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} col={a=0.5,b=0.5,c=0.5} --rgb
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press=gB(1) night=gB(3) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
if onPress(6,24,19,9) then on = not on end if onPress(6,36,19,9) then mode = false end if onPress(6,48,19,9) then mode = true end
o=math.max(d.w/2-14,29) tA=onTouch(o,24,7,33) tB=onTouch(o+11,24,7,33) tC=onTouch(o+22,24,7,33) u = tA or tB or tC
if u then slide=mode and rgb2hsv(unpack(col)) or col end if tA then slide.a=(56-t.y)/32 end if tB then slide.b=(56-t.y)/32 end if tC then slide.c=(56-t.y)/32 end if u then col=mode and hsv2rgb(unpack(slide)) or slide end
sN(1,on and col.a or 0) sN(2,on and col.b or 0) sN(3,on and col.c or 0)
pre=gB(1) end
function setC2(v) setC({v.a*100,v.b*100,v.c*100}) end
function dGHSV(x,y,l,c1,c2) dA,dB,dC = (c2.a-c1.a)/(l-1),(c2.b-c1.b)/(l-1),(c2.c-c1.c)/(l-1) for i=0,l-1,1 do setC2(hsv2rgb(unpack(c1))) c1.a=c1.a+dA c1.b=c1.b+dB c1.c=c1.c+dC dRF(x+i,y,1,1) end end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() w=s.getWidth() h=s.getHeight() setC(theme.bg2) s.drawClear()
setC(theme.acc) dL(6,24,6,33) if on then dRF(6,24,19,9) setC(theme.bg2) else setC(theme.fg) end dT(9,26,on and "on" or "off")
setC(theme.fg) dL(6,36,6,45) if not mode then dRF(6,36,19,9) setC(theme.bg2) end dT(9,38,"rgb")
setC(theme.fg) dL(6,48,6,57) if mode then dRF(6,48,19,9) setC(theme.bg2) end dT(9,50,"hsv")
o=math.max(w/2-14,29) setC(theme.bg) dRF(o,24,7,33) dRF(o+11,24,7,33) dRF(o+22,24,7,33)
pos=mode and rgb2hsv(unpack(col)) or col a=math.floor(pos.a*33+0.5) b=math.floor(pos.b*33+0.5) c=math.floor(pos.c*33+0.5)
setC(theme.fg) dRF(o,57-a,7,a) dRF(o+11,57-b,7,b) dRF(o+22,57-c,7,c)
setC2(col) dRF(o,17,29,3)
if mode then dGHSV(o,22,7,{a=0,b=1,c=1},{a=1,b=1,c=1}) dGHSV(o+11,22,7,{a=pos.a,b=0,c=1},{a=pos.a,b=1,c=1}) dGHSV(o+22,22,7,{a=0,b=0,c=0},{a=0,b=0,c=1}) else setC({100,0,0}) dL(o,22,o+7,22) setC({0,100,0}) dL(o+11,22,o+18,22) setC({0,0,100}) dL(o+22,22,o+29,22) end
end
function clamp(v,x,y) return math.min(math.max(v,x),y) end function unpack(x) return x.a,x.b,x.c end function rgb2hsv(a,b,c)local d,e=math.max(a,b,c),math.min(a,b,c)local f,g,h;h=d;local i=d-e;if d==0 then g=0 else g=i/d end;if d==e then f=0 else if d==a then f=(b-c)/i;if b<c then f=f+6 end elseif d==b then f=(c-a)/i+2 elseif d==c then f=(a-b)/i+4 end;f=f/6 end;return{a=f,b=g,c=h}end;function hsv2rgb(f,g,h)local a,b,c;local j=math.floor(f*6)local k=f*6-j;local l=h*(1-g)local m=h*(1-k*g)local n=h*(1-(1-k)*g)j=j%6;if j==0 then a,b,c=h,n,l elseif j==1 then a,b,c=m,h,l elseif j==2 then a,b,c=l,h,n elseif j==3 then a,b,c=l,m,h elseif j==4 then a,b,c=n,l,h elseif j==5 then a,b,c=h,l,m end;return{a=a,b=b,c=c}end
